snippet: Turning roadkill into dinner is common in parts of rural America, and state lawmakers are starting to take notice.
abstract: Editorial cites measure approved in Montana that will allow citizens to salvage fresh roadkill and eat it; points out idea of consuming roadkill is becoming noncontroversial in rural America.
lead_paragraph: Turning roadkill into dinner is common in parts of rural America, and state lawmakers are starting to take notice.
